From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To show both the ReadOnly and the Upgrade ROMmon image versions when you are in ROMmon mode, as well as which ROMmon image is running on the Cisco 7200 VXR or Cisco 7301 router, use the **showmon** command in ROM monitor mode.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: The following example, applicable to both the Cisco 7200 VXR and Cisco 7301 routers, uses the showmon command in ROMmon to display both ROMmon images and to verify that the Upgrade ROMmon image is running:
Upgrade ROMMON is selected for next boot
ExtraInfo: Use the showmon command when you are in ROM monitor mode. Use the show rom-monitor command when you are in Cisco IOS.

RelatedCmds.description: Selects a ReadOnly or Upgrade ROMmon image to be booted on the next reload of a Cisco 7200 VXR or Cisco 7301 when you are in ROMmon.
